title: Welcome to Evolved Dragons and Demons

bodyText.part1: If you want to try this game, you should create an account - press the lock icon in the top right corner and choose 'Register'.
bodyText.part2: Already a user? Press the lock icon and choose 'Login'.
bodyText.part3: Create Characters, explore the world, fight other players, and have fun!

city.title: The City
city.description: Wander the streets of the city

combat.title: Combat
combat.description: Engage in combat with other players

aboutSettings.title: About / Settings
aboutSettings.description: View the about page and change settings
